rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 1 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat) and Low Pressure Area (LPA)

Issued at: 4:30 PM, 06 June 2025(Friday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Metro Manila, Cavite, Bulacan, Bataan, Pampanga, Batangas, Laguna, Quezon, Rizal, Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Marcelino, San Felipe, San Narciso, San Antonio, Castillejos, Subic, Olongapo) and Tarlac(San Jose, Capas, Bamban).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Nueva Ecija, Tarlac(Concepcion, Anao, Tarlac City, Gerona, La Paz, Paniqui, Pura, Ramos, San Manuel, Victoria, Camiling, Mayantoc, Moncada, San Clemente, Santa Ignacia) and Zambales(Candelaria, Iba, Masinloc, Palauig, Santa Cruz) which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
